original_title: Dark Passions of a Sexual Serial Killer
overview: Elle-Anne is a beautiful and passionate young woman who indulges her passion for sex by working as a high class prostitute. Her life is thrown into disarray following a series of increasingly disturbing nightmares. She visits a psychotherapist in an effort to try and understand. This leads her on a dark and twisting journey towards a shocking truth.
title: Dark Passions of a Sexual Serial Killer
